div.p: Whoever, with a diligent mind and prayers sent to God, from whom all good things proceed and by whom men are made teachable in divine knowledge, will have read through this little book, will undoubtedly gather fruit from it not to be despised; for it was ensured to be handed over to the light in Latin and German phrasing by the man distinguished in piety and doctrine, Mr. Bullinger, the Antistes of ZÃ¼rich.
